subject: CNN Alerts: bush, etc.
body:
CNN Alerts: bush






 



Alert Name: bush
Killings, homelessness: Collateral damage of 'peace' plan

05/09/07 01:11 PM, EDT
"I buried my child in the forest," said Jeannette Nyirarukundo, who fled her village in eastern Congo when it was attacked by the government army meant to protect it.
FULL STORY



Alert Name: bush
House may pass crackdown on student loans
The bill will tackle conflicts of interest in the $85 billion student loan market amid widening scandals.
05/09/07 12:55 PM, EDT
The House is expected to adopt a bill cracking down on conflicts of interest in the $85 billion student loan market amid a widening scandal, House aides said Wednesday.
FULL STORY
